summary.para: Contains format data for an AAC or HE-AAC stream that includes AudioSpecificConfig() data.

remarks.para: Use this structure to access the AudioSpecificConfig() data that follows an structure. This data is present only when the wStructType member of the HEAACWAVEFORMAT structure is zero.

summary.para: A byte array that contains the value of AudioSpecificConfig(), as defined by ISO/IEC 14496-3. The array might be larger than the size given in the structure declaration. Use the value of wfInfo.wfx.cbSize to determine the size.
